New Records: Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadran stitched a record partnership of 154 runs for Afghanistan.
Key Match Events: Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadran had a brilliant partnership.
Fazalhaq Farooqi took a five-wicket haul.
Afghanistan bowled out Uganda for 58 runs.
Naveen-Ul-Haq and Rashid Khan took two wickets each.
Post-Match Reflections: Rashid Khan expressed pride in the team's performance and emphasized the importance of mindset.
Brian Masaba, the skipper of Uganda, mentioned the nerves going into the first game and hoped to bounce back in the next game.
Fazalhaq Farooqi, the Player of the Match, reflected on his performance and the importance of franchise cricket in handling pressure.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at the Providence Stadium in Guyana.
Afghanistan's win gives a massive boost to their net run rate.
